returns._0: A flag indicating whether the Verax instance is running on testnet

getPortalsCount().details: Returns the length of the `portalAddresses` array

returns._0: The number of Portals already registered
A flag indicating whether the given address is allowlisted
A flag indicating whether the given address is an issuer
True if the Portal is registered, false otherwise

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params.isRevocable: whether the portal issues revocable attestations
params.name: the portal name

params.issuer: the address to be revoked as an issuer

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

revoke(address).details: Only the registry owner can call this method

params._isTestnet: the flag defining the testnet status

params.issuer: the address to register as an issuer

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

updateRouter(address).details: Only the registry owner can call this method

deployDefaultPortal(address[],string,str.notice: Deploys and registers a clone of default portal

getIsTestnet().notice: Checks if the caller is allowlisted.

getPortalByAddress(address).notice: Get a Portal by its address

getPortalsCount().notice: Get the number of Portals managed by the contract

isAllowlisted(address).notice: Checks if a user is allowlisted.

isIssuer(address).notice: Checks if a given address is an issuer

isRegistered(address).notice: Check if a Portal is registered

register(address,string,string,bool,stri.notice: Registers a Portal to the PortalRegistry

removeIssuer(address).notice: Revokes issuer status from an address

revoke(address).notice: Revokes a Portal from the PortalRegistry

setIssuer(address).notice: Registers an address as an issuer

updateRouter(address).notice: Changes the address for the Router
